name: Climate Revolution
description:
A card game about building political pressure to solve the climate crisis. 

To win the game, create pressure by playing cards. Once pressure reaches 40, you have won the game. If the temperature ever rises to 4° C, you lose the game. Each turn, the temperature rises and one event card is drawn for each player. Then players take turns and can each draw a card, play a card or discard one for two new cards. Players can hold a maximum of 7 cards. Permanent cards can change the game mechanics though! Keep on playing and learn as you go!

Because of the time constraints of the Climate Jam, the multiplayer mode wasn't finished, the game only has a fraction of the cards it should have and there are bugs aplenty. After finishing my current project Core Defense, I shall return to this and unlock its full potential!
